content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the political situation in which Jefferson gave the address in the excerpt?

choices.label: Federalists sought compromise with Democratic-Republican politicians.
The Federalist Party remained more powerful than the Democratic-Republicans.
The Democratic-Republican Party had won the presidency for the first time.
Democratic-Republicans had gained increased support from wealthy merchants.

topic.text: 4.2: The Rise of Political Parties and the Era of Jefferson

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
